title: Implement Strong Password Policies
description: Ensure all user accounts have strong passwords that meet minimum complexity requirements
requirements: Combination of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters
remediation: Configure password policy in system settings to enforce complexity requirements

title: Enable Multi-Factor Authentication
description: Multi-factor authentication should be enabled for all privileged accounts
remediation: Implement MFA solution and enforce for privileged accounts

title: Regular Security Patching
description: Ensure all systems are regularly patched with the latest security updates

title: Network Segregation
description: Implement network segregation to isolate critical systems
requirements: VLAN configuration for different system types
remediation: Configure network segmentation using VLANs and firewall rules

title: Log Management
description: Implement centralized logging and log review processes
remediation: Deploy SIEM solution and configure log forwarding from all systems
